current.testimonial_desc_1: Received my order of Hospitality Rattan Outdoor Aluminum 42” Pub Table #923-6117BRZ and I am very pleased with it.  It was packed and shipped with great care and arrived in excellent condition.  Abe was my salesperson and was extremely nice and very helpful.  He certainly knows his merchandise.  I am still looking for the Panama Jack Palm Bay Palm Tree Bar #9106107-BRZ which has been discontinued.  I will continue to check back with Abe for my future patio needs since he is so pleasant to deal with.

settings.content:
Better Patio Professional is a trusted partner for contractors, designers, builders, architects and more

Join the Better Patio Professional Team for exclusive pricing and simplified project organization. We believe in one-on-on, expert-level consulting with dedicated account managers who will work with you from start to delivery and everything in-between. Our inventory of residential- and commercial-grade outdoor products include outdoor kitchens, components, built-in and freestanding grills, luxury patio furniture, accessories and much more. Complete the form below to apply for Better Patio Professional to access exclusive perks and commercial pricing on most products!
